  • Open Lab

Open Lab

  • For the science community

  • For the science community

The Mohammed bin Rashid Academy of Scientists is the primary body representing the UAE's science community. Composed of the UAE’s top researchers from several institutions in the country, with expertise in the fields of natural sciences, engineering and health and medical sciences, MBRAS aims to establish a link between the science community, government and industry through supporting evidence-based policies, solutions to challenges, and creating opportunities.

Objectives

  • 01

    To ensure continuity of research by utilizing available equipment in institutions across the UAE.

  • 02

    Creating scientific environment that supports scientific advancement by reducing the cost through the adoption of sharing equipment between research institutions.

  • 03

    Sharing knowledge across institutions.

Partners
